skills.title: Web Dev
skills.description: Knowledge in front-end web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create responsive and visually appealing websites. I’m skilled in crafting clean layouts, implementing interactive features, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility for a seamless user experience.

skills.title: React
skills.description: I have hands-on experience with React.js, building dynamic and responsive web applications. I am familiar with its component-based architecture, state management, and best practices for creating seamless user interfaces.

skills.title: Python
skills.description: I have practical experience with Python, using it for a variety of tasks including scripting, data analysis, and building efficient applications. I am familiar with its versatile libraries and best practices for writing clean, maintainable code.

skills.title: Asp.Net Core
skills.description: I am familiar with ASP.NET Core, leveraging its features to build robust web applications and APIs. I’m familiar with its modular architecture, dependency injection, and tools for creating scalable, secure, and high-performance applications.

portfolio.title: Collector's App
portfolio.description: This app was created out of the neccesity of having a place to store and organize my collection of Hotwheels. It is great!

portfolio.title: Matricula TA
portfolio.description: This web app was created as a prototype for a school project. People can see the courses available and register for them.
